name: Mountain (itch) (srlivingston)
description:
My first attempt at making a game. Learning Unity and learning how to implement ideas.

Hit Esc at the start to close the menu. I bugged the animation and couldn't fix it.

There are probably bugs and there's no real end to the game.

Right Click Mouse - Camera

E - Interact

WASD - Movement

Shift - Sprint

Spacebar - Jump

Esc - Open/Close menu
